related_questions.question:
The text is for no 3 - 5    I have a little sister. Her name is Salsa She is only a year old. She is cute. Salsa like a boy
because her hair is very short. She can walk but she can't speak. She likes walking around
the house
Salsa likes to play ball. Mother gave her a ball yesterday. The ball is soft Salsa likes to kick
the ball I love my sister very much. She has the best smile in the world
3. Who is Salsa
a. The writer's baby
b. The writer's little brother
c. The writer's little sister
d. The writer's little boy ​

A fish live on the....
Tolong bantu jawab​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

water

sea

ocean

dead sea

lakes

Penjelasan:

intinya ikan hidup di dalam air brother

a fish lives on the…
artinya: “ikan hidup di…”

ikan hidup dimana? laut/danau/sungai/delta/kolam/muara

karena banyak banget kita pilih yang paling umum aja ya, laut

laut bahasa inggrisnya sea

jadi jawabanya…

“a fish lives on the sea”

related_questions.question:
CAUTION    LIVE, CHILDREN PLAYING

 What does the above caution mean?
A.	Children are playing games around the place.
B.	Children are not allowed to play around the area.
C.	It is the place for children to play around here.
D.	You have to be careful because children are playing there.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D. You have to be careful because children are playing there.

Semoga benar dan menjadi jawaban terbaik ya :)

related_questions.question:
Simple present Tense (Nominal)    1.She .........my classmate *

A.was not

B.are not

C.is not

D.am not

2. ........... Brian our new neighbour? 

A.Is

B.Am

C.Was

D.Are

3. I ........ a teacher in SMAN-8

A.is

B.are

C.am

D.were

4. Arina and Firda............best dancers of this competition. 

A.are

B.is

C.was

D.am

5. ...................they the students of MTsN Barito Utara? 

A.Was

B.Am

C.Are

D.Is

6. Football ......... the most

favourite sport in earth. 

A.am

B.is

C.are

D.were

7. My brother and I......... actors for action movies. 

A.was

B.is

C.am

D.are

8............Mr. Bean so funny person ?

A.Is not

B.Are not

C.Am not

D.Were not​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1.C she is not

2.A.Is

3.C.Am

4.A.Are

5.C.Are

6.B.is

7.D.Are

8.A.Is not

Penjelasan:

I/YOU/THEY/WE :PAKAI ARE

HE/SHE/IT:PAKAI IS

Kalau lebih dari satu orang seperti no.7 pakai ARE

jika yg di tanyakan nama orang pakai IS

Jawaban:

1. C

2. A

3. C

4. A

5. C

6. B

7. D

8. A

Subject. To be

I. Am

You, We, They. Are

He, She, It. Is

Penjelasan:

Semoga membantu :D

related_questions.question: The sulfur oxides and nitrogen oxides will ... in the air​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

The sulfur oxides and nitrogen oxides will evaporate in the air​

Penjelasan:

Sulfur oksida dan nitrogen oksida akan menguap di udara​ dan akan menimbulkan polusi udara, bahkan hujan asam yang sangat merugikan.

Semoga membantu ya.
